name: dirmerge
description:
Splice / merge multiple sets of directions in such a way as to maintain near-optimality upon truncation.



References:
author: J-Donald Tournier (jdtournier@gmail.com)

inputs.name: subsets
inputs.description: the number of subsets (eg. phase encoding directions) per b-value

inputs.name: bvalue_files
inputs.description: the b-value and sets of corresponding files, in order

inputs.name: out
inputs.description: the output directions file, with each row listing the X Y Z gradient directions, the b-value, and an index representing the phase encode direction

inputs.name: unipolar_weight
inputs.description: set the weight given to the unipolar electrostatic repulsion model compared to the bipolar model (default: 0.2).

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

output-files.name: out
output-files.description: the output directions file, with each row listing the X Y Z gradient directions, the b-value, and an index representing the phase encode direction
